skills.name: What Are You Looking At?
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to **50%** of Herta's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: One-Time Offer
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to **50%** of Herta's ATK to all enemies. If the enemy's HP percentage is 50% or higher, DMG dealt to this target increases by 20%.

skills.name: It's Magic, I Added Some Magic
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to **120%** of Herta's ATK to all enemies.

skills.name: Fine, I'll Do It Myself
skills.desc: When an ally's attack causes an enemy's HP percentage to fall to 50% or lower, Herta will launch a **follow-up attack**, dealing Ice DMG equal to **25%** of Herta's ATK to all enemies.

skills.name: It Can Still Be Optimized
skills.desc: After using her Technique, Herta's ATK increases by 40% for 3 turn(s) at the beginning of the next battle.

eidolons.name: Kick You When You're Down
eidolons.desc: If the enemy's HP percentage is at 50% or less, Herta's Basic ATK deals Additional Ice DMG equal to 40% of Herta's ATK.

eidolons.name: Keep the Ball Rolling
eidolons.desc: Every time Talent is triggered, this character's CRIT Rate increases by 3%. This effect can stack up to 5 time(s).

eidolons.name: That's the Kind of Girl I Am
eidolons.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Hit Where It Hurts
eidolons.desc: When Talent is triggered, DMG increases by 10%.

eidolons.name: Cuss Big or Cuss Nothing
eidolons.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: No One Can Betray Me
eidolons.desc: After using Ultimate, this character's ATK increases by 25% for 1 turn(s).
